historyPage.title: D Insight Co., Ltd. is
historyPage.context:
a research institute company established in the R&D special zone that provides solutions such as
system engineering, shape analysis, and cost reduction based on digital twin and AI technologies
and has simulation process automation technology.

values: Designated as an official education partner of Dassault Syst√®mes

Development of an AI-based simulator for design/analysis acceleration, under the supervision
of the Ministry of Science and ICT

Development and lecturing of curriculum for Ulsan-Gyeongnam Regional Innovation Platform
USG Shared University (Nuclear Project Management 1, 2)

Development and lecturing of curriculum for Ulsan-Gyeongnam Regional Innovation Platform
USG Shared University (Advanced System Engineering)

Business agreement for the 2023 Public-Private Partnership Open Innovation Support Project
(SK Eco Plant)

Business agreement with SK Ocean Plant to establish a real-time monitoring system for
structures based on digital twin technology

Winner of the SK Eco Plant Optimization Solutions Competition for developing a real-time
monitoring system for structures based on digital twin technology
Signed a 3D modeling service contract under the 2023 Regional Industry Promotion Project
Presentation at the Gyeongnam Technopark Technology Exchange Meeting

Project for establishing an ICT digital manufacturing platform based on process simulation
technology, supervised by the Ministry of Science and ICT

Lectured for the winter session of the USG Shared University under the Ulsan-Gyeongnam
Regional Innovation Platform (Project Design I - Systems Engineering)
Provided simulation technology support for the Process Innovation Simulation Center Project

Completed a project to build a digital twin-based 3D model of a maintenance trolley,
supervised by the Ministry of Science and ICT

Signed a fourth-year contract for the Intelligent Urban Water Resources project, supervised
by the Ministry of Environment
Executed the Changwon 3D Industrial Complex Digital Platform Establishment Project

Completed a project to develop a digital twin-based key equipment simulator to reduce
operational costs of power conversion facilities, supervised by the Ministry of Science
and ICT

Participated in the Digital Asset Creation Project, supervised by the Ministry of Science and
ICT
Established a dedicated research department

Carried out a project to create a 3D virtual reality simulator for wind turbine systems based on
digital twin technology, supervised by the Ministry of Science and ICT

Signed a third-year contract for the Intelligent Urban Water Resources project, supervised by
the Ministry of Environment
Conducted SPDM development for the Korea Electrotechnology Research Institute
Established as a corporate research institute
